H0.text: what inventions did thomas edison invent list. Motion Picture Camera

H1.text: what inventions did thomas edison invent list. Light Bulb

H2.text: what inventions did thomas edison invent list. Alkaline Battery

H3.text: what inventions did thomas edison invent list. Phonograph

A4.text: He developed many devices in fields such as electric power generation, sound recording, and motion pictures.

A5.text: These inventions, which include the phonograph, the motion picture camera, and early versions of the electric light bulb, have had a widespread impact on the modern industrialized world.

A6.text: Edison's patent application for the light bulb at the National Archives.

A7.text: Edison worked to create bulbs with thinner filaments and better vacuum, producing a more commercially viable light bulb.
